camera_info_publisher_right.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 
4 """
5 
6  * file camera_info_publisher_right.py
7  * brief A generate and publish the camera_info Messages from a .yaml file.
8  * authors Parag Khanna, John Thomas
9  * version 0.1
10  * \date 11 February 2018
11  *
12  * \param[in] ...
13  *
14  * Subscribes to: ..<BR>
15  *
16  * Publishes to: /yaml/right/camera_info<BR>
17 
18  This node reads in a camera calibration ouput .yaml file (as created by the cameracalibrator.py in the camera_calibration pkg),
19  and converts it to a sensor_msgs/CameraInfo message, and publish it on a topic.
20 
21 """
22 
23 import rospy
24 import sys
25 import yaml
26 from sensor_msgs.msg import CameraInfo
27 
28 def yaml_to_CameraInfo(yaml_fname):
29  """
30  Parse a yaml file containing camera calibration data (as produced by
31  rosrun camera_calibration cameracalibrator.py) into a
32  sensor_msgs/CameraInfo msg.
33 
34  Parameters
35  ----------
36  yaml_fname : str
37  Path to yaml file containing camera calibration data
38 
39  Returns
40  -------
41  camera_info_msg : sensor_msgs.msg.CameraInfo
42  A sensor_msgs.msg.CameraInfo message containing the camera calibration
43  data
44  """
45  # Load data from file
46  with open(yaml_fname, "r") as file_handle:
47  calib_data = yaml.load(file_handle)
48  # Parse
49  camera_info_msg = CameraInfo()
50  camera_info_msg.width = calib_data["image_width"]
51  camera_info_msg.height = calib_data["image_height"]
52  camera_info_msg.K = calib_data["camera_matrix"]["data"]
53  camera_info_msg.D = calib_data["distortion_coefficients"]["data"]
54  camera_info_msg.R = calib_data["rectification_matrix"]["data"]
55  camera_info_msg.P = calib_data["projection_matrix"]["data"]
56  camera_info_msg.distortion_model = calib_data["distortion_model"]
57  return camera_info_msg
58 
59 if __name__ == "__main__":
60  # Get fname from command line (cmd line input required)
61  args=rospy.myargv(argv=sys.argv)
62  #remove the ros-induced arguments in case of ros-launching
63  filename=args[1]
64  #import argparse
65  #arg_parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
66  #arg_parser.add_argument("filename", help="Path to yaml file")
67  #args = arg_parser.parse_args()
68  #filename = args.filename #'ost.yaml'#
69 
70  # Parse yaml file
71  camera_info_msg = yaml_to_CameraInfo(filename)
72 
73  # Initialize publisher node
74  rospy.init_node('camera_info_publisher_right', anonymous=True)
75  publisher = rospy.Publisher("/yaml/right/camera_info", CameraInfo, queue_size=10)
76  rate = rospy.Rate(4)
77 
78  # Run publisher
79  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
80  publisher.publish(camera_info_msg)
81  rate.sleep()
82
